src:
ＮＹダウ、最高値を３か月半ぶり更新…背景に好調な経済指標

04 Nov 2019, 21:20

　【ニューヨーク＝小林泰明】４日のニューヨーク株式市場で、ダウ平均株価（３０種）は２営業日連続で値上がりし、７月１５日につけた最高値を約３か月半ぶりに更新した。終値は前週末比１１４・７５ドル高の２万７４６２・１１ドルだった。
　好調な経済指標を背景に、米景気後退に対する警戒感が和らぎ、リスクを取って株を買う動きが広がった。
　情報技術（ＩＴ）企業の銘柄が多いナスダック店頭市場の総合指数の終値は、４６・８０ポイント高の８４３３・２０だった。
text:
NY Dow, the highest price updated for the first time in three and a half months ... Strong economic indicators in the background

04 Nov 2019, 21:20

[New York = Yasuaki Kobayashi] In the New York stock market on the 4th, the Dow average stock price (30 types) rose for two consecutive business days, renewing the highest price on July 15 for the first time in about three and a half months. The closing price was $ 27,462.11, an increase of $ 114.75 from the previous weekend.
に Against the backdrop of strong economic indicators, the alertness to the US recession eased, and the risk of buying stocks spread.
The closing price of the overall index of the Nasdaq over-the-counter market, which has many brands of information technology (IT) companies, was 8433.20, an increase of 46.80 points.
